technology.label: Angular developement
technology.decription: We offer reliable AngularJS mobile app development to build highly scalable and secure applications. By using our Angular development expertise, you can elevate your web presence goals and watch as your business objectives are translated into technical solutions. JYOTI TECHNOSOFT is an Angular development company that offers customized Angular development services to suit your business needs. Along with our maintenance and support services, you will never have to worry about the technical aspects, giving you more time to focus on expanding your business.

clientReview.review: He has fair amount of knowledge in some of the Java frameworks. Used him for a quick fix. He is affordable and quick to respond. Decent resource if you are looking to hire someone affordable.

I have been working with Dipesh since many months. His skills, hard-work, patience, perseverance, tolerance to accommodate change requests make him a start studded performer in my team. Waiting to hire him back again on my next project.
Extremely happy to work with him. He is tech person so job don't have take time to complete. Highly Recommended and will definitely work with him in future.
Very happy with Dipesh. Good work ethic and communicated well. He knows React well and I can recommend him to other companies
Dipesh was a wonderful asset to our development team. He is a GWT expert and I would not hesitate to work with him in the future on any UI/UX front end development.

jobs.jobDescription: We are looking to hire a dynamic Angular Developer to join our global team. As an Angular developer, you will be required to build a top-quality coding base. You will also be required to create amazing user interfaces for desktop and mobile apps.
jobs.address: 417, Sumerru Business Corner, Nr. Somchintamani Appt., B/H Rajhans Multiplex, Pal Gam, Surat 395009, Gujarat, India
jobs.briefJobDescription:
• Determine the functional, non-functional requirements and scope working with the business analysts and engineering managers
  • Design and develop multi-tier, cloud-native, high performance, and scalable solutions
  • Apply software engineering principles, design patterns and best practices to build solutions that are testable, secure, and robust
  • Lead cross functional agile teams across the software development lifecycle
  • Lead cross functional agile teams across the software development lifecycle
jobs.jobRequirement:
Years of Experience: 5+ years
Relevant hands-on experience with one of more of the following:
  • Web technologies - JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
  • Web frameworks – Angular / React JS
  • Mobile frameworks – React Native
  • Web server technologies - Node.js / Nginx
